protein.specific_function: Reversible hydration of carbon dioxide. Participates in pH regulation. May be involved in the control of cell proliferation and transformation. Appears to be a novel specific biomarker for a cervical neoplasia.

go_class.description: regulation of transcription from RNA polymerase II promoter in response to hypoxia
